ygData.subject: Re: My 2 coppers on Smithing...
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually I believe that its an attempt to make you work the skill and not just put practice points into the skill. You WILL have to work the skill after 20
ygData.messageBody:
Actually I believe that its an attempt to make you work the skill and not
just put practice points into the skill. You WILL have to work the skill
after 20
Silvermyst

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Sean Harty [SMTP:sharty@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, May 04, 1999 1:56 PM
> To: EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ_SMITHS] Re: My 2 coppers on Smithing...
>
> From: Sean Harty <sharty@...>
>
>
>
> VAN DEN CRUYCE JOHN wrote:
>
> > I have now become a lvl9 Warrior, and have
> > 10 more practice points to waste. I tried to dump them into Smithing as
> > well, but my trainer refused to teach me any further. I wonder why...
> > anybody have a clue?
> >
> > Gornar.
> >
> >
>
> I have had this happen with two trade skills (smithing and tailoring) and
> it
> seems that after you hit level 20 in a trade skill, they will not train
> you
> further.
>
> Hicks
